subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Jenson Button and Rubens Barrichello crossed the finish line in first and second place at the season-opening Australian Grand Prix, driving for the Brawn team, which barely survived the winter.
snippet: Jenson Button and Rubens Barrichello crossed the finish line in first and second place at the season-opening Australian Grand Prix, driving for the Brawn team, which barely survived the winter.
